title: Multimodal fusion for emotion recognition
description: Evaluation of the differents approach to recognize emotion captured by a RGB-Depth kinect camera
points: Cleaning and preprocessing of a RGB-Depth facial emotion dataset using YOLO-Face
State of the art of the differents architectures used in emotion classification
Pretraining EfficientNet model on AffectNet RGB images and synthetic depth maps generated with Depth-Anything v2
Evaluation of the different fusion strategies (early concatenation, late attention)

title: Football Vision: Data extraction from amateur football matches
description: Collect player data from amateur football matches using a single-camera (exploratory project)
points: Annotation of a custom dataset with CVAT and pre-trained YOLOv8
Implementation of players identification through jersey number recognition
State of the art of the RNN architectures and datasets for action recognition

title: Deployment of Deep Learning Functions
description: Development and deployment of deep learning inference functions as serverless services on the cloud
points: Deployment of a Nuclio platform (capable of receiving HTTP requests) using Docker
Integration of Mask R-CNN and YOLOv5 models
Development of a Web platform that allows image uploads and communication with the Nuclio platform using the Flask library
